meanings.definition: A form of body modification involving the insertion of ink into the skin
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate tattoos on his arms.
meanings.sent2: The tattoo artist created a beautiful design on her back.
meanings.sent3: The little girl drew fake tattoos on her dolls with markers.
meanings.sent4: His tattoos told a story of his life's journey.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of her tattoos stood out in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A design or symbol permanently etched into the skin using ink
meanings.sent1: The tribal tattoo on his shoulder represented strength.
meanings.sent2: Her tattoos were a reflection of her personality.
meanings.sent3: The cat's whiskers looked like tiny tattoos on its face.
meanings.sent4: The old tree had tattoos of carvings from long ago.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the tattoo amazed everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a permanent design on the skin using ink
meanings.sent1: The tattooing process involves injecting ink into the skin.
meanings.sent2: She decided to get a tattoo to commemorate her graduation.
meanings.sent3: The artist's tattooing technique was precise and skillful.
meanings.sent4: The tattoo parlor was busy with people getting tattoos.
meanings.sent5: His passion for tattooing led him to become a renowned artist.
